name: Glow Rhythm
description:
Glow Rhythm is Beat Saber without the VR, kind of...

Didn't manage to finish this game but here it is, a bit of bugs here and there but it still works. 

Important to know, there is no ESC setting, meaning you can not pause mid game. There is two Exit buttons, in main menu and Back button at the end of the song. That's it, enjoy :)

Controls: S, D, J, K - Keys
